''Minecraft: Story Mode'' is an episodic point-and-click narrative-driven graphic adventure video game similar to [[Telltale Games|Telltale]]'s previous titles such as ''[[Wikipedia:Tales from the Borderlands|Tales from the Borderlands]]''. The player is able to collect items, solve puzzles, and talk to non-player characters though [[wikipedia:conversation tree|conversation tree]]s to learn about the story and determine what to do next. Like other Telltale Games, decisions that the player makes have an impact on story elements in future episodes.<ref name=StoryModeverge>{{citation|url=https://www.theverge.com/2015/8/26/9207085/minecraft-story-mode-telltale-games-interview|title=Giving Minecraft a story|author=Andrew Webster|website=The Verge|date=August 26, 2015}}</ref> However, unlike Telltale's previous games that carry more mature or emotional overtones including the death of major characters, ''Story Mode'' is known as a family-friendly title, so the decisions are still pivotal and emotional but do not involve mature imagery or themes.<ref name=StoryModeverge/> Elements of crafting and building, central to ''Minecraft'', are included in the gameplay, following a similar approach.<ref name=StoryModeverge/> The game features combat and other action sequences, carried out through both [[wikipedia:quick time event|quick time event]]s similar to Telltale's other episodic games, and more arcade-like controls, such as steering around debris on a road.<ref>{{citation|url=https://www.ign.com/articles/2015/08/28/pax-2015-minecraft-vet-rookie-each-play-telltales-minecraft-story-mode|title=PAX 2015: Minecraft Vet, Rookie Each Play Telltale's Minecraft: Story Mode|author=Jared Petty and Ryan McCafferty|website=IGN|date=August 28, 2015}}</ref><ref>{{citation|url=https://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2015-09-09-minecraft-story-mode-a-chip-off-the-old-block|title=Minecraft: Story Mode: A chip off the old block|author=Jeffrey Matulef|website=Eurogamer|date=September 9, 2015}}</ref> The game also mixes new characters with original themes to make an entirely original ''Minecraft'' experience.<noinclude>
